alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Bexar; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:12PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Medina, central Bandera, southwestern Kendall and northern Bexar Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fair Oaks Ranch to Mico to near Tarpley. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Schertz, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Boerne, Selma, Hondo, Castroville, Bandera, Tarpley, San Antonio Int Airport, Vanderpool, Randolph AFB, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Kirby, Alamo Heights and Windcrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
